attributes.action: to Introduce sanctions against the Palestinian Territories
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Palestinian Territories must be punished for continued rocket attacks against Israeli civilian towns and the failure to adhere to the Quartet's Road Map which demands the end of terrorism.
Palestinian tactics are cruel, malicious and demonstrate that that they are not interested in the peace process. 
They are sabotaging global peace efforts and squandering the good will they have been given.
